org.gradle.api.tasks

Annotation Type InputFile


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,FIELD})
public @interface InputFile

    Marks a property as specifying an input file for a task.

    This annotation should be attached to the getter method in Java or the property in Groovy. Annotations on setters or just the field in Java are ignored.

    This will cause the task to be considered out-of-date when the file path or contents have changed. To make the up-to-date check only dependent on the path and not the contents of the file or directory, annotate it instead with Input.
